docs.lead_paragraph: The following list has been selected from titles reviewed since the Christmas Issue of Dec. 5, 1976. Such a list can only suggest the high points in the main fields of reader interest. Books are arranged alphabetically under subject headings. Quoted comments are from earlier issues of the Book Review.

headline.main: A SELECTION OF NOTEWORTHY TITLES:; Autobiography & Biography
